message.content:
1. Can you provide verifiable evidence from credible sources to confirm whether Virat Kohli became the top-ranked T20I batsman in the ICC rankings in 2014 and held that position as of May 2017?
2. Is there concrete evidence to support the claim that Kohli joined the Indian cricket team in 2020? Can you provide a source for this information?
3. Can you cite any reliable sources to confirm whether Virat Kohli won the Man of the Tournament twice at the ICC World Twenty20 in 2014 and 2016, as claimed?
